name: Weezard (pello)
description:
The weezard found a mirror but he didn't know it was a magic mirror!. This artifact started creating copies of the weezard using his own reflection.

Now it's time to help the weezard to find the mirror and put an end to this curse. Use potions to create illusions and other tricks to scare the reflections of the weezard.

Controls:

  • Arrows left/right to move
  • Up: to jump
  • Down: cast a spell, (the latest potion picked)

Spells

  • Green: Make reflections fly
  • Orange: Bat swarm
  • Red: Invisible weezard
  • Blue: Freeze reflections
  • Black: rare ???
